presets.title: Revenue Trend
presets.sql: SELECT ORDER_DATE, SUM(REVENUE) AS TOTAL_REVENUE FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY ORDER_DATE ORDER BY ORDER_DATE

presets.title: Units Sold by Category
presets.sql: SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SUM(UNITS_SOLD) AS TOTAL_UNITS FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY PRODUCT_CATEGORY ORDER BY TOTAL_UNITS DESC
presets.description: Sales volume distribution across product categories.

presets.title: Regional Performance
presets.sql: SELECT REGION, SUM(REVENUE) AS TOTAL_REVENUE, SUM(UNITS_SOLD) AS TOTAL_UNITS FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY REGION ORDER BY TOTAL_REVENUE DESC
presets.description: Revenue and volume breakdown by geographic region.

presets.title: Daily Transactions
presets.sql: SELECT ORDER_DATE, COUNT(ORDER_ID) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY ORDER_DATE ORDER BY ORDER_DATE
presets.description: Total number of orders processed per day.

presets.title: Headcount & Avg Salary by Department
presets.sql: SELECT DEPARTMENT, AVG(SALARY) AS AVG_SALARY, COUNT(EMP_ID) AS EMP_COUNT FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY DEPARTMENT ORDER BY AVG_SALARY DESC
presets.description: Average compensation and employee headcounts across different organizational departments.

presets.title: Headcount by Role Level
presets.sql: SELECT ROLE_LEVEL, COUNT(EMP_ID) AS EMP_COUNT FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY ROLE_LEVEL ORDER BY EMP_COUNT DESC
presets.description: Employee distribution by seniority and role level.

presets.title: Performance Ratings
presets.sql: SELECT PERFORMANCE_SCORE, COUNT(EMP_ID) AS SCORE_COUNT FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY PERFORMANCE_SCORE ORDER BY PERFORMANCE_SCORE

presets.title: Hiring Trend
presets.sql: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM HIRE_DATE) AS HIRE_YEAR, COUNT(EMP_ID) AS HIRES FROM {TABLE_NAME} {WHERE_CLAUSE} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM HIRE_DATE) ORDER BY HIRE_YEAR
presets.description: Growth in workforce over time based on hire year.
